example.eg: There was a bowl of sweets on the Reception desk, so Rob took a handful.
example.egtrans: 接待处有一碗糖果，所以罗勃拿了一把。

example.eg: Tim grabbed a handful of peanuts at the bar while he waited for his drink.
example.egtrans: 当提姆在酒吧等自己的酒时，他抓了一把花生。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 一把的量, 一握的量

example.eg: Only a handful of people volunteered for the project.
example.egtrans: 只有少数人自愿参与该项目。

dsense.name: be a handful, be a real handful

example.eg: That boy is a real handful.
